segments.advisor_message: So, um, could you tell me, like, how's your, uh, current state of health? I mean, any, um, issues or just how do you feel overall? I understand that's, y'know, important.
segments.client_message: Ah, yeah, well, uh, I don’t, like, have any major issues really. Just a few, you know, um, minor things like I get tired kinda easily. Nothin’ serious, though. So, yeah, I guess it's okay?

segments.advisor_message: Right, and, um, do you smoke or have you smoked in the past? Like, I wanna make sure I get a good picture, y'know?
segments.client_message: Oh, um, yeah, I smoke. Like, maybe a pack a week, I guess? I started when I was, like, 18 or so. Uhh, it’s just been a long time you know?
